sense.def:
The stalk of a flower, leaf, or fruit
je tanki del cveta, lista ali sadeža, ki ga povezuje z drevesom ali drugo rastlino.

To stalk a person or a wild animal
pomeni potihoma in na skrivaj slediti neki osebi ali divji živali, da bi jo ujeli ali opazovali.

seg.quote: He moved like a tiger stalking its prey.

sense.def:
To stalk somewhere
pomeni hoditi togo, ponosno ali jezno.

seg.quote: She stalked into the living room.
